document.title: Pellete de liens du 27-06-2005
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
ActiveWidgets :: Professional JavaScript GUI tools Des objets complexes en javaScript, xhtml et CSS sous license GPL. (Tags: javascript conception xhtml javascript.lib )
John Cox :: Compressing Javascript with PHP ( via ) Compresser ses librairies javaScript afin de soulager son serveur. (Tags: javascript php optimisation )
ffmpeg-php ffmpeg-php is an extension for PHP that adds an easy to use, object-oriented API for accessing and retrieving information from video and audio files. (Tags: php dev video php.lib )
css.maxdesign.com.au - CSS resources and tutorials for web designers and web developers ( via ) Excellentes ressources sur les CSS. (Tags: css webdesign tutorial )
:: phpPatterns() - Hello world in Patterns L'incontournale exercice du Hello World en design pattern MVC... ou comment tuer un moustique au bazzoka (Tags: dev tutorial xp design-patterns )
